vibe_prompt: Build a personal finance tracker with expense categories, monthly budgets, and spending analytics with charts, which sould have minimum features : add income and expenses, categorize transactions, set monthly budget per category, track budget vs actual spending, visualize spending by category (pie chart), show monthly trends (line/bar chart), filter by date range, export data

user_stories.title: Add Income and Expenses
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to add income and expense transactions with amount, date, and description so I can track my finances.

user_stories.title: Categorize Transactions
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to assign categories (e.g., Food, Rent) to transactions so I can organize my spending.

user_stories.title: Set Monthly Budget per Category
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to set a monthly budget for each category so I can control my spending.

user_stories.title: Track Budget vs Actual Spending
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to see how my actual spending compares to my budget per category so I can stay on track.

user_stories.title: Visualize Spending by Category
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to view a pie chart of my spending by category so I can understand my expense distribution.

user_stories.title: Show Monthly Trends
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to see a line or bar chart of my monthly spending trends so I can analyze changes over time.

user_stories.title: Filter by Date Range
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to filter transactions and charts by a date range so I can review specific periods.

user_stories.title: Export Data
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to export my transaction data to a CSV file so I can use it externally.

output.frontend_code:
Personal Finance Tracker

Add Transaction

Transactions

to

    Spending by Category (Pie Chart)

    Monthly Trends (Bar Chart)
